import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { fetchEntries } from '../utils/api'; // Import the utility function import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; const SnuggleBoard = () => { const [entries, setEntries] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // Load entries when the component mounts const loadEntries = async () => { const data = await fetchEntries(); setEntries(data); // Update the state with fetched entries }; loadEntries(); }, []); // Empty dependency array means this runs only once after the component mounts return (
Snuggly Cats
  • Home
  • Register
  • My information

Snuggle board

Here you can find all the lovely cats that have signed up for snuggles


{entries.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
Name Color Breed
{entry.username || entry.name} {entry.color || 'N/A'} {entry.breed || 'N/A'}
); }; export default SnuggleBoard;
